AUTHOR: Keane Nguyen
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for adding my cog to your server. This game is a simple Kahoot-like trivia quiz for your server members to earn credits. If you want to customize this cog, you can modify the source code manually. Please take a look at the license for my cogs in my Github repository.
NAME: Parrot
DESCRIPTION: Earn credits by playing a trivia game. The earlier you answer a question correctly, the more points and credits you earn.
